design_philosophy.aesthetic: Swiss-Style Institutional. High contrast, organized grids, functional color coding.

rules: Use Primary (#005883) for headers, primary buttons, and active states.
Use Secondary (#F47920) for Call-to-Actions (CTAs) and high-priority alerts.
Use Accent (#F0B429) sparingly for 'In Progress' states or highlights.
Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text.

structure: Header: White, sticky, contains user profile and breadcrumbs.
Content: Bento grid layout. Cards with 1px border, no shadow.
Left Panel (4 cols): Queue List (Waiting). Scrollable.
Right Panel (8 cols): Current Ticket Action Area. Large controls.
Left (8 cols): Current Called Ticket (Massive). Video/Image carousel below.
Right (4 cols): History/Waiting List. High contrast list.
Simple Steps: Select Service -> Select Priority -> Print.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md shadow-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md transition-all
buttons.kiosk: h-32 text-2xl font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95 border-2 border-primary/10

cards.interactive: rounded-lg border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all cursor-pointer

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-ring focus:ring-offset-2

rules: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.
Focus rings must be visible (ring-2 ring-offset-2).
Color alone must not convey meaning (use icons + text).
Public display must have high contrast (White on Dark Blue/Black).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all ticket numbers (e.g., A-001).
Implement the 'Public Display' in Dark Mode by default.
Use the UNAD colors strictly: Primary #005883, Secondary #F47920.
For the Kiosk, ensure buttons are massive and touch-friendly.
Ensure the 'Ticket Printing' logic is modular (mocked for web, but ready for ESC/POS).
Use 'recharts' for the Admin Dashboard reports.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle textures.
Avoid 'AI Slop' (generic centered layouts). Use grids and asymmetry.
